verses.verse: Then <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G4260>Jesus<s%> led <S%G1564>up<s%> of <S%G1492>the<s%> <S%G1417>Spirit<s%> <S%G243>into<s%> <S%G80>the<s%> <S%G2385>wilderness<s%> to be tempted <S%G2199>of<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G2491>devil<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3571>nights<s%>, <S%G3983>he<s%> <S%G5305>afterward<s%> <S%G3983>hungered<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3985>tempter<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, It is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2198>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G1607>proceedeth<s%> <S%G1223>out<s%> of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>taketh<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3880>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G3754>written<s%>, He shall <S%G1781>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G1909>On<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G142>up<s%>, lest <S%G3379>haply<s%> thou <S%G4350>dash<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3825>Again<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, Thou <S%G1598>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> make <S%G1598>trial<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Again <S%G3825><s%>, the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3880>taketh<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3880>an<s%> <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1166>showeth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> thou wilt fall <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> saith <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>Get<s%> <S%G3004>thee<s%> <S%G4567>hence<s%>, Satan: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, Thou shalt <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> shalt thou <S%G3000>serve<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G863>leaveth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>.
Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>he<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G402>up<s%>, he withdrew <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>, he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is by the <S%G3864>sea<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3725>borders<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3508>Naphtali<s%>:
that <S%G2443><s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>,

The <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3508>Naphtali<s%>, <S%G3598>Toward<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> of the <S%G1093>Gentiles<s%>,

the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, to them did <S%G5457>light<s%> spring <S%G393>up<s%>.

From <S%G575><s%> that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G3340>Repent<s%> <S%G1063>ye<s%>; for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2424>he<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G4613>Simon<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1205>Come<s%> <S%G3694>ye<s%> after <S%G3450>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3694>I<s%> will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G863>they<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G1350>nets<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> going <S%G4260>on<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>, <S%G2675>mending<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>, and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4013>about<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> all manner <S%G3956>of<s%> <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all manner <S%G3956>of<s%> <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G189>report<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>forth<s%> into <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4947>Syria<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>that<s%> were <S%G2560>sick<s%>, <S%G4912>holden<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G931>torments<s%>, possessed with <S%G1139>demons<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4583>epileptic<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3885>palsied<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> great <S%G4183>multitudes<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1179>Decapolis<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> Judaea <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>.
